overview: Sonny Steele used to be a rodeo star, but his next appearance is to be on a Las Vegas stage, wearing a suit covered in lights, advertising a breakfast cereal. When he finds out they are going drug the horse in case its too frisky, he rides off into the desert...
tagline: Tell me Normanâ€¦ did you think it was going to be this tough to get rid of a pain in the ass like me? Ma'am, I had no idea.
title: The Electric Horseman
